messages.name: amiamyberlin
messages.content:
@marinadino and I washed the garbage bags full of bedsheets labeled "dirty" "to wash" in my basement. 

They turned out to be a lot of this. We also found some fitted sheets & fleece blankets, which we will take to the next kiezburn. 

I think we collected sheets for kiezburn 2023, so all these sheets were donated by harlots. 

All of these duvet covers and pillowcases aren't really useful for the harlot playspace, so I'd prefer if people come get them, or I will donate them around 15.01. 

Here are pictures. I wasn't able to take pictures of everything, so if you're missing sheets or blankets, let me know. I'll look around.

messages.name: NeaNopNop
messages.content: intending to print them as â€art-bookletsâ€œ as described in that message

messages.name: NeaNopNop
messages.content: ..the name I chose is well known and for whoever comes by theyâ€™ll have the chance to have a look at the  papers themselves to acquaintance with the concept and make up their mind - if they choose to that is. Despite it stings a text I spend quite some time to come up with and condense, I appreciate the honest feedback very much! ğŸ™ Honestly, it might be fun even viewing it from that point as in.. ppl not knowing for sure or assuming some ai generated random text - just more of the right questions to ask as already implied

messages.name: NeaNopNop
messages.content: To add to it, I also learned about relevance realization rather recently on a different event where one of the authors held a keynote and it got me interested..a pretty interesting new lens to offer to the whole thing. So including this in context of an art exhibition  seemed just about right - also bc it first sounds as if it could be sth generic but it turns out its fresh cogsci content delivered right where one didnâ€™t expect it

messages.name: AlexPooPip
messages.content:
reminder for Thursdayâ€˜s Burner Sauna at StudioDB

We cannot wait to have you back. As always: Sauna is heated up from 6 p.m. on - we will be there a bit earlier, so just come after work. 
We will have an agro yoga session, awesome DJs, massages and "Wichtelympics". Bring a funny, trashy present for approx. 5 Euros and take part in an immense fun. We will gamble until everyone got a present. Please don't bring things that are actually waste ;)

Admission is 15 Euros to cover costs.

messages.name: eefan
messages.content:
Wrap up 2024 and prepare for 2025âœ¨
  
Letâ€™s take a moment together to reflect on the year weâ€™ve had and set intentions for whatâ€™s ahead. 

No prep neededâ€”just show up however youâ€™re feeling that day. Grab some snacks, a cup of tea, and maybe some pen and paper for writing down thoughts. 

Weâ€™ll do some simple exercises to look back on the highlights and challenges of 2024 and start imagining what 2025 could look like. 
And, of course, itâ€™s always special to share some time together. 

 Looking forward to seeing you there!  

Pleun

---

Free online workshop today from 17:00-18.30h. Can be for your business or for you personally. If youâ€™re interested send me a dm and Iâ€™ll add you to the list!(:

messages.name: robertfoss
messages.content:
I'm away on a trip, and am looking for someone to stay in my apartment and water the plants.

It's a top floor apartment with three rooms; livingroom/kitchen, bedroom and an office. It's spacious, has a balcony and a big-ass bath tub.

Couples are fine, no pets. 

Location: Fhain, by Warschauer. 
Available: 15 Jan - 30 Jan
Price: 500Eur
Deposit: 1000Eur

If you're interested, send me a DM.

messages.name: pojapoi
messages.content:
Finance Tracking Gsheet

alsooooo, @felix_seta @thisis_flo and i revamped the finance tracking sheet and it's split into three areas:

- General Overview --> get a quick idea of overall income, expenses and how it differs from the 2024 prediction and the team budgets 
- Team Budget Tabs --> for the team leads to input their budgeted positions
- Income/Expenses --> this is where we would enter income from camp fees, tent rentals and also all incured expenses that shall be submitted via the form @thisis_flo just shared

it's mostly "automated" in terms of calculating any actuals budget, totals etc. but of course requires manual inputs in the income/expense section. 

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15gPnojR4bzWlRcrlaZkVSZIat9-Ug6C4tT345R_IBUA/edit?gid=1521057043#gid=1521057043

messages.name: joejung
messages.content:
The next dedicated group is gathering!!! 

The Mastermind Circle is a powerful & often near magical social technology to support a group of dedicated humans, passionate movers & shakers & actionfriendly dreamers in achieving their goals, dreams & purpose

The likemindedness of a circle turning wishes into reality is a great adventure to be had.Â Apply for the next round & see you at the MasterMind(/heart/soul)Circle soon. 

We will start our next 6 months journey with the first in person meeting 28.1.2025 | 19:30 in Berlin/StadtMitte

Growing our missions in a passionate group of inspired, benevolent leaders & visionaries

https://urbanjoy.de/mastermind

Best wishes, Paul & Joe 

P.s. If you are interested in this Format & want to join at the next occasion PM to @JoeJung

messages.name: danfly1989
messages.content: The BG night it is a part of starts at 18:00, though I expect we start 19:00 at the earliest. It is the the most beginner friendly module out there imo

messages.name: Dominik
messages.content: I would be interested. At what time of the day ? I am a beginner, though I have played bg2 and bg3.

messages.name: danfly1989
messages.content: 5e. I don't think the Stormwreck module exists for any other edition, excluding homebrew stuff.

messages.name: Dominik
messages.content: Which DnD edition ?

messages.name: danfly1989
messages.content: FYI: Not quite a board game, but starting a new beginner friendly DnD campaign tomorrow evening at Harzer StraÃŸe if anyone is interested (Dragons of Stormwreck Isle). Module allows for up to 3 more places

messages.name: Kinga
messages.content: I don't

messages.name: TrueMilli
messages.content: Best ask there. Let me know if you don't have a reddit account and I'll ask for you.

messages.name: Kinga
messages.content: Ein paar Leute in meinem Umfeld kÃ¶nnten auf die Idee kommen, an eine (demokratische) Partei zu spenden. WÃ¼rde auch das zÃ¤hlen?

messages.name: Kinga
messages.content: Ah, alles klar, danke.

messages.name: TrueMilli
messages.content: It's unrestricted but ovua's matching "likely" goes to Effektiv Spenden.

messages.name: Kinga
messages.content: WeiÃŸt Du, ob das fÃ¼r Spenden egal an wen gilt?

messages.name: TrueMilli
messages.content:
If you're considering donating (more) this year, this would be a good week. "ovua" on reddit is doubling donations (no limit). You just need to post a screenshot of your donation here: https://www.reddit.com/r/mauerstrassenwetten/comments/1her0h7/
Effektiv Spenden confirms that the person donated the claimed amount last year: https://ea-germany.slack.com/archives/CGL0MDGPK/p1734341844717209

PS: The 3x might be a bit confusing, this is about an ongoing donation matching program on the subreddit for Deutsche Depressionshilfe. You don't need to participate in that to get matched by "ovua".
